content.detailedDescription: My fiance' and i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette before going to bed. despite living within city limits, we have a wide open view of the sky, so we always admire the stars on clear nights. last night was a mostly cloudy night, but we happened to both be looking in the same direction when an object appeared out of nowhere and immediately descended, at a slight angle, and seemed to be landing. the orb shaped object was a blueish-white color, and was unlike any shade of color either of us had ever seen. it was bright, yet dull and quickly yet gracefully fell at a steady, constant speed. we followed it with our eyes until it fell out of sight behind the house directly behind ours. it appeared to be many miles away though, to the east. we immediately asked one another if we had just witnessed the same thing, and we had. we stood there in shock for a minute, wondering what else we were about to witness, and then began excitedly talking about it. we had never seen anything even similar to it before. it was amazing. we continued to watch the sky's for awhile expecting to see a helicopter or something searching for whatever had fallen, but there was nothing.
content.summary: Dull blue-white object suddenly appeared, immediately descended, and appeared to be landing many miles away.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance' and i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette before going to bed. despite living within city limits, we have a wide open view of the sky, so we always admire the stars on clear nights. last night was a mostly cloudy night, but we happened to both be looking in the same direction when an object appeared out of nowhere and immediately descended, at a slight angle, and seemed to be landing. the orb shaped object was a blueish-white color, and was unlike any shade of color either of us had ever seen. it was bright, yet dull and quickly yet gracefully fell at a steady, constant speed. we followed it with our eyes until it fell out of sight behind the house directly behind ours. it appeared to be many miles away though, to the east. we immediately asked one another if we had just witnessed the same thing, and we had. we stood there in shock for a minute, wondering what else we were about to witness, and then began excitedly talking about it. we had never seen anything even similar to it before. it was amazing. we continued to watch the sky's for awhile expecting to see a helicopter or something searching for whatever had fallen, but there was nothing.
content.summary: Dull blue-white object suddenly appeared, immediately descended, and appeared to be landing many miles away.

content.detailedDescription:
While walking our dogs in our front yard, we observed between 8 and 12 red/orange lights in the sky. they were the approximate color and intensity of road flares. they were in a straight line and evenly spaced.  they were moving at a steady pace (the approximate speed of a single engine aircraft) in a sse to nw direction.  when the first two were observed they were thought to be a blimp although no other normal marker lighting was observed and no craft outline was visible.  after the initial 2 lights were observed, 6-10 more appeared in the same flight path.  i moved from the yard to the rear of the house, getting binoculars to further observe the object(s).  even with the binoculars no clear outline of a craft, or additional marker lighting was observable.  the last light to appear was more yellow in color. no engine noises were ever heard. the lights moved steadily and slowly to the northwest before disappearing into the clouds of an approaching thunderstorm.

i routinely sit on the deck at night observing the night sky.  this area is heavily traveled by commercial and private aircraft, and medical helicopters.  i have also seen the iss overfly the area on occasion as well as almost nightly satelite overflights.  the lights observed in this incident were unlike any previously seen.  they were much lower and much brighter.
content.summary: Series of bright red/ orange lights flew silently overhead in a straight line pattern

content.detailedDescription: Sailing on the chesapeake.  saw the pipelike large object with no wings going left to right ...No wings.....Took a picture of it while husband was sailing.  no sound...About 1 mile away, then it took off through the clouds.  this is the second time we had an encounter.  the first time was in the evening in tiffin, ohio. i have a picture, but you will show my husband's face, so i will not send the photo i have.  would be happy to send it to you with a different venue without public viewing.
content.summary: Sailing on the chesapeake.  i said "my god, look at that!"  large pipelike object moving behind me as i was sailing, started at first going horizontally and then ascened through the clouds and upward.

content.detailedDescription: We were on the porch with clear skies and what looked like a huge chinese lantern or a balloon on fire traveled in an arched path from east st. louis to west st. louis in a matter of minutes.  we had no idea what could be that large and go that fast.  there was a helicopter stationary in the area and the craft was much larger.  i got part of it on an iphone video but it only looks like a white dot in the video.  completely freaked us out.  my friend said it had two beams that came out of it before it disappeared on the west side.  i didn't see that part as i was trying to take the video and a tree in the front yard was in the way and i lost it after that.
content.summary: Large chinese lantern shape crossing over all of st. louis in minutes

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving over the bridge to the beach when we noticed a rainbow.  it was very odd because there was, nor had there been any rain.  the sky was very clear with only one small cloud.  i snapped a picture and noticed two objects that appeared to be flying in tandem.  i thought it was dust so i cleaned the lens and took two more photos. in all three photos, the two objects can be seen flying closer to the cloud in each photo.  they are two bright discs of light that flew stright, then appeared to arc up over the cloud if you follow thier trail.  both left a distinct trail. the objects appeared to be very bright balls of light. i then had to pay attnention to the road and lost them.
content.summary: Two very bright lights leaving a trail that were flying in tandem.  their path was straight with a slight upward arc.

content.detailedDescription:
initially we saw one, slow-moving, redish orange, blinking sphere alone further down rt 30- it was blinking and moving irradically and it disappeared- we joked that it wasn't a plane, but a ufo that wasn't flying very well... then driving further down rt 30 in the opposite direction heading west, we saw another redish-orange, blinking sphere and then quickly noticed that there were 6 of them in a horizontal, ascending line in the sky. at that point we pulled over in the norwin taco bell parking lot and got out of the car where we could clearly count 6 of them in the sky. they were ascending horizontally across the sky and then seemed to grow smaller and smaller and then disappear, as if they were leaving the atmosphere. we watched them for a few minutes and noticed that more were appearing over the treeline as the ones that we initally were watching disappeared. there was no sound. we did see a plane at this time, but it was much lower than the objects and flew overhead and didn't seem to be trying to interact with them. after watching these for a few minutes,and filmed 2 of them that were close together, we drove to the highest point that we could get to in order to try to see where they were coming from- this happned to be the norwin goodwill parking lot. once, there, i filmed a few more as about 3-5 more came across the sky in the same formation, blinking redish orange, and then ascending up and leaving the atmosphere. 
  while at this location, another car with 3 or 4 people asked if we were seeing the same thing and corroborated our story. the woman's voice is on the video as i was following the entire path of one of the orbs as it came across the sky and disappeared... after filming this last one, no more appeared. as an additional note, about 45 minutes before seeing the first object- before going into a store- we heard strange popping noises that sounded like fireworks or thunder, but not exactly the same as either. there were also strange flashes in the sky, similare to lightening, but they were not lightening. after coming out of the store was when we first noticed the inital, slow moving and then disappearing object while we were at a gas station. 3-5 minutes after that was when we saw the fleet of 6 lined up and leaving earth... another additional note was that this was all between 10-10:30 pm easter time. there was moderate traffic in the area and this was on a saturday night and there were many people driving in and around a central shopping area on route 30 in the north huntington/norwin area, so many other people aside from the family who stopped and talked to us while we were filming could have witnessed this.
content.summary: 6-12 redish orange blinking spheres ascending in a line and seeming to leave the atmosphere over westmoreland pa

content.detailedDescription:
I was in rochester hills driving through to do a drive by check on my mother, i looked up for a second and saw a red glowing object in the sky. at first my thought was "oh i wonder if i'm looking at mars", sometimes you can see the planets; but then i thought that it wouldn't be right the clouds were blocking the moon and stars so there was no way that this object was mars, it was located in front of the clouds not behind. so then i thought maybe someone was shooting off fireworks- but that wouldn't work out either because the object was hovering. if it was a firework flare then the force gravity would send it back down, therefore it couldn't hover. 
this strange object just hovered there for a good minute or two, and then it did a weird dip down, crossed over the right and shot back up to its original spot, creating a triangle like affect. it hovered a few seconds and then it began to wiggle a little; so by that time i pulled down a street to watch it; it moved a little, it kinda glided back and forth. and then it just disappeared. personally this isn't the first time i've come across a ufo- i've had one sighting a year since 2010, prior to that i saw none. but my parents saw one back in the seventies.  and the only physically problem i had was from straining my eyes, it was just some mild dizziness, and eye muscle pain. it was an interesting sight this one was. i wish i would have had the time to fully grab my phone and snap some pictures.
content.summary: Strange red orb like object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was star gazing on friday july 13 when i saw a really dim light passing right over going strait north.
the light was pulsating : from dim(about 5 seconds) to a really bright flash(brighter then any stars) to dim again and dissapear and start again the same sequence: dim. flash. dim. dissapear.Sequence lasted as long as i could see the light

look like a a satelite reflecting light (no satelite should of been there when i searched on my ipod app ''night sky''.
content.summary: Pulsating light

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i decided to go outside, to look at the night sky, in hopes of witnessing a meteor shower around 2-2:30 am.  as we looked up at the night sky, facing south east, looking up, when i saw, what i thought was a satellite but, it seemed to flash. i thought its just a plane.  but taking a closer look, it was traveling very,very fast.  too fast for a plane, even a jet and the flash was not consistent. and there was no noise.  it traveled across the night sky, looking like a star, but was moving at a exceptional rate of speed and at times traveled erratically,left,right seemed to stop and hover and go again. they looked to be in our atmosphere, in front of stars  i was excited, because this was unknown to us.  a ufo!!! 

but what started to happen from that point is still unbelievable to me still. as we watched, another one, just like it came from a totally different direction.  as we followed that one and it started to fade out the further they traveled away from us.  we noticed another, and then another and so on.
  
some where dimmer, no flashing, others flashed a little more.  they differed in directions, some stopped for more then a second or two, and go again. at times we saw 2 at a time.  traveling in different directions.  we couldnt believe what we were seeing, we even woke our oldest daughter, and her friend up, just to verify we werent mistaken.  they saw the same objects. we all stood there mystified and in awe, at what we where witnessing.  we continued to see them until the dawn,(4am ish) when they started to come few between, until we saw no more. i lost count around 20.  and no they were not shooting stars.
what were they???
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Went outside in hopes to see meteors.  i witnessed, what looked to be like a satellites,,traveling at high speeds across the night sky . it flashed but unlike an airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside in backyard around 9:15 pm and noticed the slow-moving craft. it was very large, with pulsating red lights around exterior that outlined shape of craft. the lights were in rotating/pulsating in a circular pattern around craft. it flew very low, made no noise, and at the end of sighting, what appeared to be 2 black helicopters with red lights arrived to escort craft. it moved slowly through sky approximately 300 feet above us. the craft was massive, about size of football field. it moved from southeast to northwest. it then rapidly descended and appeared to land when it reached a private airfield that is called skyline ranch. 

at first, we wondered if it were a plane, but it was completely silent. then we thought it may be 9helicopters flying in tight formation, but we discarded that theory when the two black helicopters arrived and we could determine the difference. it followed the same flight pattern as many of the planes around here, but was definitely not a plane as it was simply too massive.

the dogs were visibly upset and wanted to be indoors, and now we are wondering why we can't find any other reports of the object. feelings before and after exist of frustration that no one else saw it or reported. we are a little consumed by trying to find out what it was.
content.summary: Red, pulsating lights outlining ship, 2 helicopters follow

content.detailedDescription: Awoke about 2 am 7-15-12,  heard a sound like a huge jet engine coming and going over and over, the sound increases like its coming to me and decreases like its moving away? i set my sony cam recorder outside the back door for about 6 minutes, i have heard this before and wasn't able to record it properly, i had my cam recorder at the ready in my office. i havent played the video yet, figure i'd get this posted first. this sound was heard several months ago and was reported to mufon.My wife also heard this sound as it came thur the sheet rock/wall in bedroom, she said she heard it all night and when useing restroom.Will submitt sound when i get it on my pc
content.summary: Jet like noise in the distance, sound increase and decrease

content.detailedDescription: Went outside for a ciggarette, saw strange light moved funny and glowing, dogs started barking then they ran inside whimpering, light then moved away to the east then disappeared, watched for a while but it didn't come back !Went outsaide for a ci
content.summary: Strange light moved funny and glowing, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the computer, and in the window that looks out the northern sky, there was a light that caught my eye.  i was looking towards the san fernando valley from west la and i thought it was a helicopter but was surprised to hear no sound even with the window closed, as it seemed rather close (bright).  i opened the window to hear nothing and proceeded to watch the object appear to ascend while it moved across the sky towards the west.  it burned out at about 50 degrees from my perspective off the horizon.  then i saw three more orbs over the next twenty minutes do a similar thing but all moving to and fizzling out at different locations in the sky.  i woke my wife as a second witness.  i have not seen nothing over the last hour and a half.
content.summary: Over the couse of about 20 minutes, i saw (4) orange orbs that looked like fire balls moving across the sky and up until they burned out.

content.detailedDescription: Orange, blinking lights drifting into the sky and then fading away when the lights were high enough.
content.summary: Orange, blinking lights drifting into the sky and then fading away

content.detailedDescription: I was about to get ready to do a night observation with my night vision monocular after watching movie with my brother. i stepped outside my balcony where i observed a ufo 2 nights before, then i noticed a bright red almost flare like orb moving slowly directly above our condo complex, altitude seemed to be under 5000 feet like plane or helicopter red light but double the size and brighter. i yelled at my brother to look, he first said its a helicopter light then soon light brighttened orange and diamond like, then began to dim to pinpoint and disappeared within 2 secs. i was astonished and wasn't even thinking of hooking up my night vision to my dvr but i did observe the orb, the light was not flashing, pulsating and when it disappeared i could not see it in my night vision monocular and it did not seem far away so it completely disappeared. the sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds from east to west in straight path. this was no re entry meteor  or satellite as was too slow, unless this can occur. i know the night sky especially from my own balcony, have owned a few telescopes and this is a first for me as it was 2 nights ago...My brother a complete skeptic was baffled...What is going on this week!!!??? about 10 mins after the disappearance a high flying helicopter circled the area 3 times even taking the same flight path of the object. this helicopter was not making a terrestrial  search as he was too high... anybody else see this object directly over false creek passing over granville and burrard bridge before disappearing...Answers please!!!..
content.summary: Slow moving bright red orange orb over vancouver false creek to english bay

content.detailedDescription:
Driving (long-haul truck driver)north on i-15 between the cities of baker and barstow, california.
on july 8, 2012 at 4:00 am i observed 2 unfamiliar bright lights. one was an extremely bright white and the other was red.  i said to myself "these lights do not belong here!" because i'm familiar with the night sky. after driving several minutes i decided to stop as i wanted to get a better look.  the known lights in the sky (venus and or jupiter and a reddish light) were stationary and the newly observed lights to the north (left) were slightly moving.  i wanted to make sure i wasn't seeing things so i parked on the freeway onramp (see diagram #2)after driving through the rest area outside of barstow. the truck is still running at this point with 'sirius' radio on. i grabbed my brand new "smart phone" that i had never used for photography (so was unfamiliar with it's functionality) and began to take a still photo.  what i didn't know was the camera had switched to video mode so my first shot is a video of a red ring of lights. my initial target was the bright white light but then the red light merged with the bright white light becoming a ring of red lights. i tried to focus on these lights but they were moving.  this video is 15 seconds in length only because when i hit the shutter again thinking i was taking a second photo thereby stopping the video.  it's possible i had zoomed in.  i then realized what i had done.  i was standing on the top step outside of the drivers door.  
i got down to the ground and walked around the front of the truck to right side and out into the field 50+feet away from the truck.  as i'm standing there i focused on the bright white light and took the first of 4 still photos.  when i took the 2nd pic the light got larger and changed to red-orange.  as i got ready to take the 3rd shot suddenly the light shot straight at me increasing in brightness and size.  i then hit the shutter.  i was able to get 1 more shot before the light disappeared.  at this point, i was truly afraid for my life.  poof! it was gone.
see diagram #1 for overview of rest area and field depicting where objects seen in sky and relation to nearest cities and freeway.
lastly diagram #3 shows the sequence of events.
content.summary: 2 lights which merged (1 bright white 1 red) became red ring of more than 10 lights then shot straight at me at great speed then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out of car in parking lot. looked up and saw a close glowing object moving across sky from my left to right it was a oval shaped object glowing orange with other pulsating blue and green, it was a solid object the size of passenger jet and moving about the same speed. then i noticed several more coming from my left to right in a staggered pattern. i could see these things clear as day. there was between 6 and ten of these things. and as i stood there totaly awe struck i heard a passenger jet coming in from over my right shoulder towards chicago i was surprised to see that these things looked to be same in size to the jet. the objects were closer to the ground and actualy flew under the flight path of the jet. i live in a flight path leading into chicago and see a lot of air traffic, but im 52 years old and have never seen anything like this except in movies. no ufo home videos could do justice to what i saw. these things are the real thing and i dont know that i will ever be the same again.
content.summary: 6 to 10 solid flying objects

content.detailedDescription:
Observed the objects from the back yard...
objects appeared out of the north and proceeded south west, and then disappeared. first thought they were flare like, but they stayed lit abd bright as they passed over.
objects were in groups of 2-3 and all on the same path south west.
they all travelled at a similar speed...
very strange and odd....
content.summary: Orange glowing lights heading sw

content.detailedDescription: My dogs kept barking erratically. i let them outside to use the restroom when they continued to bark. i looked around and noticed a grey colored oval object moving over my house at slow rate of speed 30 mph or less. there was not any wind and very little cloud cover. there was not any sound and wind felt at all when the object passed my home. i was on my back porch when it went over head so i ran to the front door and the object was gone.
content.summary: Dull grey object 500-100 feet over house

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting outside in the backyard talking with friends. one friend commented-what is that? she pointed to an orange ball of light traveling parallel with the tree line from right to left. we watched it continue its path-conjecturing as to what it could be-no blinking lights like an airplane-perhaps a helicopter? couldn't hear any sound. once it reached our far left-it disappeared into a pinpoint of orange. the friend that spotted it at first explained how she thought it was a firework @ first because of the way it ascended & then she waited for it to explode but it didn't. it just kept traveling across the sky.
content.summary: Orange ball of light ascended like a firework than traveled across sky from right to left-disappeared into a pinpoint of light

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was playing outside in our backyard and came running in saying that she has seen a "flying saucer" hover over our house and slowly move off to the north.  it then "reappeared" again over our neighbors house on the south side and moved off slowly to the north again.  she stated that it was very close to her and it had multicolored lights.
content.summary: Saw object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on 2164. i look up and two or more lights in the sky. at the time i was thinking that i was looking at stars. i was driving to denton tx to walmart.I was looking at them at the same time driving the things that look like stars.The things that look like star was going so fast that it was not airplane. i do not know what it was the colors was no from a airplane. the colors flashed randomly and the star like things turn to the lift then shot off so fast that it was hard to see them.I lose sight of them when they shot off the fast as they did. i think that one when over denton i do not know if it did our not. i hop i was not seeing things. i am not good at this 
my spelling is bad.
content.summary: Flying ufos over denton texas.

content.detailedDescription: At 10:00 pm my husband was watching tv from the glider chair inside our  houseboat living room. the windows were all open because it was 30+ degrees today. i was resting on the sofa half asleep. suddenly he jumped out of his chair and said: look! what is that? what is it? from the large screen window, we saw a glowing orange sphere (basketball size) fly slowly across lake in a straight line close enough to us, then it went faster further away from us and up to the sky about a mile away. there's another houseboat on the other side of the lake (from the side where the light originated) maybe they saw it too? we didn't hear any sounds. we had an excellent view on open waters. we've been houseboating for many years and never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Orange glowing light ball above the lake

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in my family room, my daughter was upstairs and said she heard a weird humming sound, i heard it too but  it was probably from washer in basement, i said i was going to check the perimeter which is a running joke in our family anytime anyone thinks they hear or see something outside, anyway i went out and looked up and right over my house there was a red object glowing brighter then dimmer. i watched for a long enough time to see there were no navigation lights blinking, so i ran into the house and grabbed my binoculars, went back outside which took about  ten seconds, my wife was reading and asked me what i was doing and i said there was something over the house, i went back and was watching and i could slowly start to actually see the structure, and at the same time the light was dimming until it completely blinked out and i could clearly see the whole shape of the object, completely round and black, my wife came out and i told her where to look without putting down the binoculars, when she said she could see it i looked with my eyes and could see it too, i then kept looking with my binoculars until it disappeared over some houses it never made a sound that i could hear. i was amazed to actually be able to see the structure so clearly, mind blowing! total time was about two minutes
content.summary: Red  glowing bright/dim object over my house got my binoculars and watched as the light slowly dimmed then blinked out saw a black round object

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Several of us were sitting on the patio when i looked up in the sky and seen a light appear over the hill. it appeared to be a helicopter because of the blinking bright lights so i watched it and them another appeared behind it. i told the people i was with that it was strange for a helicopter to be in our area when all of a sudden another light appeared. we could not tell the shape of the objects because of the bright light but they looked like helicopters but there was no sound and then 4 more appeared. they flew up into the sky and disappeared as soon as they went into a light cloud. there was approximately 9 flying objects that flew in a upward angled path. we all sat there trying to figure out what we had just seen but could not come up with an explanation. they flew almost in a formation like pattern. if they were helicopters we would have heard some type of sound because they were close enough to our location. the sky had some over cast but the sky was clear above the cloud were they all disappeared. we kept waiting for the to reappear but they didn't.
content.summary: Multiple bright lights appeared in the sky on after another like helicopters they flew up in a upward line and disappeared in the clouds. no sound was heard

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Several of us were sitting on the patio when i looked up in the sky and seen a light appear over the hill. it appeared to be a helicopter because of the blinking bright lights so i watched it and them another appeared behind it. i told the people i was with that it was strange for a helicopter to be in our area when all of a sudden another light appeared. we could not tell the shape of the objects because of the bright light but they looked like helicopters but there was no sound and then 4 more appeared. they flew up into the sky and disappeared as soon as they went into a light cloud. there was approximately 9 flying objects that flew in a upward angled path. we all sat there trying to figure out what we had just seen but could not come up with an explanation. they flew almost in a formation like pattern. if they were helicopters we would have heard some type of sound because they were close enough to our location. the sky had some over cast but the sky was clear above the cloud were they all disappeared. we kept waiting for the to reappear but they didn't.
content.summary: Multiple bright lights appeared in the sky on after another like helicopters they flew up in a upward line and disappeared in the clouds. no sound was heard

content.detailedDescription: a nearby relative of us called and told us to look outside and up at the sky because something unusual was happening.  she told us that there were around 8 white orbs in the sky starting low in the air and going above cloud cover, and they were all fairly close to each other.  by the time we went outside, there were 3 or 4 doing the same thing.  what amazed me the most was how low they were to the ground (relative to a plane), the distance between each craft, and how fast they were moving.  they were moving 2x the speed of a military plane, but were not as close together as military aircrafts were.  they kept a constant direction and didn't blink their lights keeping an orb like shape.  it was hard to tell, but they looked like they were spinning.  our relative said she saw red light, but i could only see white bright light, brighter than any plane i have seen.  at first glance i started going through the things it could not be, i quickly came to the conclusion it was extraterrestrial.  it was a really cloudy night here in pittsburgh, so in about 20 minutes, all of the spacecrafts went above the clouds and disappeared.  a couple of them appeared in a break in the clouds later, they looked like meteors or satellites.
content.summary: A orb with white light hovered then flew in straight path more than 50
